short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track job applications and opportunities to your Kiter Board

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kiter is a simple powerful and free copilot for your career journey. 

Whether you are actively applying to jobs or just want to keep an eye on opportunities - set up an account and see what you have been missing. 

The extension lets you save opportunities and updates from anywhere as you browse. Kiter provides you updates about new open roles - suggestions - and sorts through recruiter email you forward.  

Get started - It's Free!
